EmailTemplate.name: EB-11-10-202211-EMP-CHBC-NSWLTR-Partner-Essentials-Newsletter-Consultant.Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Individualized diabetes management yields real results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Partner Essentials FEATURED As we recognize November as Diabetes Awareness Month, I’m pleased to work for Teladoc Health, an organization that is truly committed to helping those living with diabetes. In my previous position as a benefits consultant at a large consultancy, I saw firsthand how the Teladoc Health chronic condition management solutions supported employers in helping employees improve their health with personalized interventions. With 6 in 10 U.S. adults living with a chronic condition such as diabetes or hypertension,1 it’s more important than ever to offer affordable, accessible and high‑impact support that delivers real results. My team and I are here to support you and to provide you with the resources you and your clients need to learn about our solutions. Please feel free to reach out at any time to let me know how we can assist you! Best regards, Lara Bunn Vice President, Strategic Partnerships Learn more about me: Why Teladoc Health Q&A with Lara Bunn <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/636a99e0820892d68c576238]]> EVENTS HLTH 2022 <[[https://www.hlth.com/2022event]]> November 13-16 | Las Vegas, NV Join us at HLTH and be sure to attend our featured sessions: Results, Innovation and Equity: Laying the Ground for Whole‑Person Care Jason Gorevic, CEO, Teladoc Health Tuesday, November 15 | 10:10 a.m. Pacific | Seaport Stage Real-World Results of Whole‑Person Virtual Care Dr. Vidya Raman-Tangella, Chief Medical Officer, Teladoc Health, and Dr. Rajiv Patel, President of Health Care Enterprises Provider Strategy at Centene Monday, November 14 | 11:00 a.m. Pacific | Impact Pavilion DFW Business Group on Health 18th Annual Benefits Forum <[[https://dfwbgh.org/benefitsforum2022/]]> December 14 | Irving, TX Join us at DFWBGH and be sure to visit our booth. RESOURCES When it comes to diabetes, no two paths are the same because no two individuals are the same <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/article/when-it-comes-to-diabetes-no-two-paths-are-the-same/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=vidya-article&utm_term=&utm_campaign=movember-partner-essentials-consultant&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Research shows that an individualized solution is the best way to help manage diabetes. Creating lasting behavior change through personalized engagement <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/creating-lasting-behavior-change-through-personalized-engagement/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=sap-case-study&utm_term=&utm_campaign=november-partner-essentials-consultant&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Learn how SAP empowered its employees to engage in virtual chronic condition management programs. 4 myths about using virtual care to reverse diabetes <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/636a9995e82fd7de1b0f9810]]> Let’s set the record straight on managing chronic conditions with virtual care. IN THE NEWS Teladoc Health CEO on potential M&A, cost cutting and more <[[https://digitalhealth.modernhealthcare.com/transformation/teladoc-ceo-potential-ma-cost-cutting-and-more]]> Teladoc Health is providing free virtual healthcare services to Florida residents impacted by Hurricane Ian <[[https://teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Is-Providing-Free-Virtual-Health-Care-Services-to-Florida-Residents-Impacted-by-Hurricane-Ian/]]>* Teladoc Health Names Laizer Kornwasser as President, Enterprise Growth & Global Markets <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Names-Laizer-Kornwasser-as-President-Enterprise-Growth--Global-Markets/]]> How SAP leans on telemedicine to deliver whole‑person care <[[https://www.benefitnews.com/news/teladoc-helps-sap-deliver-whole-person-care]]> *We are dedicated to helping anyone affected by natural disasters and encourage those who need support to reach out to us anytime through our disaster hotline <[[https://www.teladoc.com/disaster-hotline/]]>. FAST FACT Enrolling in a mental health program is the greatest contributor to improved clinical outcomes for members enrolled in Teladoc Health’s Chronic Condition Management Plus solution.2 1Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. "Chronic Disease in America." Accessed October 18, 2022. https://www.cdc.gov/chronicdisease/tools/infographics.htm
2Teladoc Health. "Multi-program chronic condition solutions amplify outcomes." About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
